lines.text:
[Joey draws a pistol]
Joey, it's not that kind of an evening.
Can you type 170 words a minute? Can you sew? Can you dance? What can you do?

[about to leave her family to go off with Eddie]
I'll get my coat.
Bullshit! Looks like a lot of fuckin' bullshit!
Hey, don't blame her! What difference does it make what she says, what she feels, what she thinks? For whatever reason, she belongs to me.
Yeah, you two pricks belong together.
What, I'm a prick?
Not you. Her.
What? Are you callin' your wife a prick?
All right. You two get out of my fuckin' house.
Hey Daddy, what are you doing?
Shut up and drink your beer!
We were made for each other. We're both banged up.
[while smoking a cigarette]
We quit smoking together.
Do you have hair on your nails?
She doesn't love you! She doesn't love me! She's de lovely.
I wanna take beer bottles and smash 'em over people's heads.
OK.
I just wanna - I wanna smash 'em.
OK.
'Cause I love you.
What the hell're you talking about?
Make some coffee, Eddie.
I love my wife. She likes to break beer bottles over people's heads. That's what she loves.
